search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Hunter (hunter.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Hunter is located at: [https://hunter.io/pricing](https://hunter.io/pricing)【3:0†source】.
